MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH47 and EH55 postcode areas of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 6.38AM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.21AM on 24 October 2020.
